|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 108 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Standard bandwidth: 54 Mbit/s, Maximum bandwidth: 108 Mbit/s
(only via D-Link device with XtremeG 108M: DWL-G520, DWL-G520+, DWL-G132) ====Hardware==== * [http://wiki.openwrt.org/ru/toh/d-link/dwl-2100ap ''DWL-2100AP'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] *[http://www.sown.org.uk/wiki/DWL-2100AP ''DWL-2100AP'' on '''SOWN''' Wiki] D-Link hardware revision A4, firmware revision 2.20EU *CPU: [[Atheros]] AR2313A-001 B52307B 0635 TAIWAN *RAM: ESMT M12L128168A-7T AZG1P536E 0610 (16MB) *Flash: Spansion S29GL032M90TFIR4 0634CRM-K (4MB) *Eth: IC+ IP101A-LF 0640C15 KPF0005.1 (10/100Mbps) ==Links of Interest== ===Fotum threads=== * [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=14050 '''DD-WRT''' forum theme about DWL-2100] * [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=634210 '''DD-WRT''' forum thread] about ''DWL-2100'' in theme about Atheros SoC * [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=31539 Bootloader] for MX29LV320D (''D-Link DWL-2100AP rev A5'') - Ivan8 on '''OpenWRT''' forum * [http://stas.noskov.name/wi-fi/2100ap/ Flashing ''D-Link DWL-2100'' to ''D-Link DWL-3200AP''] (ru) * [http://dety.net.ua/?p=193 Flashing ''DWL-2100'' via FTP] (ru) ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===JTAG=== JTAG connector: J5 ===Serial=== Serial connector: JP2(See Pic.2.) ====Serial Pinouts==== {|border=1 |pin4 |pin3 |pin2 |empty |pin1 |- |RX |Ground |VCC +3.3V |align=center| -  |TX |} ==Pictures==
'''User Images''' Image:DWL-2100AP revA5 boardincase.JPG|Pic.1. Board top view Image:DWL-2100AP revA5 jacks.JPG|Pic.2. Serial and JTAG Image:DWL-2100AP revA5 boardrear.JPG|Pic.3. Board bottom view [[Has images::internal| ]] Image:DWL-2100AP revA5 case bottom.JPG|Pic.4. Case bottom
[[Has images::external| ]] ==Notes== 1. ''Rexxer'' reportes about power currency: with 5V 1A DWL-2100AP worked fine.
2. Serial port with TTL levels, don't plug to RS232C otherwise CPU will be damaged!
It is need interface converter between Serial port of AP and RS232C port of PC.
3. Board like ''DWL-2100AP Rev. A4''. Same board used in the DWL-2100 (North America/Europe),
DWL-2010 (North America), DWL-2200 (North America/Europe) and Alpha Networks WAPD19.
List of devices printed at top left corner of the board.
4. Board marked with text "8WAPD19..9A1G"
5. Board contain small internal anthenna (located near at LED "WLAN")
6. Admin's password length restricted to 12 characters max (may be 0..12 chars) ===Administer with CLI=== Some features available only via text console or telnet or SSH. Login and password same as in the web interface.
To get list of available commands type "help". For save changes and close session type "quit". ==== Service mode ==== Telnet or SSH to device, login, enter command "alpha" and next password "sdd21234". You are in the service mode.
Command "help" displays all commands (user-level and service-level). ==See also== *[[D-Link DWL-2100AP rev A1]] *[[D-Link DWL-2100AP rev A2]] *[[D-Link DWL-2100AP rev A3]] *[[D-Link DWL-2100AP rev A4]] *[[D-Link DWL-2100AP rev A5]] [[Category:English Documentation]]
